title: LEAGUE OF LAGGING
body:
Perfect connection but when I play LoL I dc and lag spike extremely often and sometimes for long periods of time. While all this is happening on LoL I'm still perfectly able to use the internet to watch streams, use spotify and EVEN PLAY OTHER GAMES WITH STABLE PING while I'm sitting there on 1k+ on League.

I noticed this has been happening since reworked Shen was released and I've encounter this exact issue throughout last year and it kinda comes and goes as it pleases. I've tried disabling iphelper and peer to peer transfer on the client, not too keen on copping low prios so hopefully there's a fix I haven't tried yet.

replies.body:
Hey FlawlessCarrier,

Could you perform all the steps on the [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), then if possible test your connection in a Custom match? If that doesn't help, run a [tracert following the steps here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2) and post the results so we can see where the lag starts.

-DTN
